title: Restock Shelves from Backroom
description: A sales associate notices that a popular item is running low on the sales floor and needs to restock it from the backroom overstock.

tasks.description: Identify the item that needs restocking.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate knows which product to get.

tasks.description: Check the inventory system to confirm there is overstock available in the backroom.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows there is a case of the item in the backroom.

tasks.description: Retrieve a case from the backroom and restock the shelf to its full capacity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The shelf is fully stocked, ensuring the product is available for customers to purchase.
